snippet.title: Crooked Waters - Early Access gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Crooked Waters is a multiplayer virtual reality game available on Steam June 19th 2018, where players immerse in thrilling sea battles. Together with your fellow pirates you'll try to survive the clash with other pirate ships.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/815280/Crooked_Waters/

Crooked Waters 
Website: https://www.crookedwatersvr.com
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/craftgamestudio
Medium: https://medium.com/@CraftGameStudio

Join the discussion on Discord:
https://discord.gg/m8yweFx

--------------------------------------------------------

The gameplay trailer was made possible with thanks to UKRifter, Javabart, JWallaceRTW, Tattastic Gamer VR, and all the of the other testers featured in the video!

Check out their channels if you like the content:
https://www.youtube.com/user/TheUKRifter
https://www.youtube.com/user/javabart
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxFDpY5dUtah2ZBoGPKzGCg
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNMlzmbsecxckGzWjJsa5ZQ
